snippet.title: Pan'orama - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Pan'orama is available now on Steam. Build a colorful world and see the features of this city-building puzzle game in this latest trailer.

In Pan'orama, create amazing landscapes and discover a wide range of structures with special abilities. Enter the world of beauty and tranquility with the panoramas of your own creation and don't forget to pet your new animal friends.
